name: Pebble_Beach
text:
Pebble Beach
Pebble Beach was the destination for a planned pilgrimage by Dr. Lawrence Jacoby.
After Jacoby informed FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper about following a man in a red Corvette on the night Laura Palmer died, he told Cooper of his travel plans.
Behind the scenes
Pebble Beach is an unincorporated community in Monterey, California.
